Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-1550 affecting package keras for versions less than 3.3.3-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-1550 affecting package keras for versions less than 3.3.3-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package keras is earlier than 3.3.3-2, affected by CVE-2025-1550
